Text: I'm sorry if this is an ungrateful question.... but why is it taking so long.... I've got 28% and ETA is more than two years... Vuze has been on almost constantly for 12 days...(all my relevant settings are in order).

Hawkmum the problem is at my end. i'm having connection problems with my provider (a bunch of idiots).

I wont let it die.
Also Vuze maybe contributing to my problems since the last update it feel sluggish reverting to an old build don't seem to fix the problem.
